title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 71.10 - Evaluation criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 71.10 - Evaluation criteria

State Regulations

The department shall evaluate applications for program
assistance using the following criteria: (a) conformity with program eligibility
requirements; (b) soundness of the
business enterprise; (c) credit
history; (d) depth of management
experience; (e) ability to repay
the loan; (f) contribution of the
project to local water quality improvement; (g) the adequacy of the collateral available
to secure the loan; and
(h) such
other criteria as the department may deem appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
71.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
